text: Copying Beethoven is a 2006 American German Hungarian biographical drama movie directed by Agnieszka Holland and starring Ed Harris, Diane Kruger, Matthew Goode, Ralph Riach, Phyllida Law. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:German biographical movies Category:German drama movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies about composers Category:Movies about classical music and musicians Category:Movies directed by Agnieszka Holland
title: Copying Beethoven (movie)
